channel.title: Please help compile error!
channel.description:
This is what i have as my compiler
@echo off color 2 title EvoloutionX Compiler echo Compiling Net @echo off "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin/java.exe" -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/tools/*.java pause
when i double click compile a error comes up saying
compiling net unrecognized option -d could not create the java virtual machine press anykey to continue
if you help me out you will get mod on my 562 server!
I AM RUNNING ON A 64 bit operating system

item.title: Please help compile error!
item.dc:creator: @boxes boxes
item.description:
@boxes wrote:

This is what i have as my compiler

@echo off
color 2
title EvoloutionX Compiler
echo Compiling Net
@echo off
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin/java.exe” -d bin -cp deps/jython.jar;deps/log4j-1.2.15.jar;deps/mina-core-1.1.7.jar;deps/slf4j-api-1.5.3.jar;deps/slf4j-log4j12-1.5.3.jar;xpp3-1.1.4c.jar;deps/xstream-1.3.1-20081003.103259-2.jar;deps/xpp3-1.1.4c.jar -sourcepath src src/com/rs2hd/tools/*.java
pause

when i double click compile a error comes up saying

compiling net
unrecognized option -d
could not create the java virtual machine
press anykey to continue

if you help me out you will get mod on my 562 server!

I AM RUNNING ON A 64 bit operating system

Read full topic
